title: Riot why? How can you be this cruel?
body: I just want to look cool, and {{champion:18}} is one of my favs. Help maybe? I can't get more rp right now! Ive spent a lot on your game allready. Give me some slack man!

replies.body: Hey we might be able to offer some slack!  :P  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can work something out.  :)

Hey so, how long do you think it will take with that ticket thing? No one seems to have responded to it yet? Did i do it right? [link to the ticket/post thing](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/31858149?flash_digest=d9c3ff26bd1fc9a1fb4e68ec0917dc299c4745e7)
Hey, I was able to confirm your ticket was received.  :D Hang tight, and a specialist will reach out as soon as they can!
Ok, thanks man, you're a great help, and a lovely person.
Oh man ima do that, thanks! You guys are pretty cool, and get a lot more badmounthing than you deserve.
